contract enables efficient distribution of rewards to multiple users      using Merkle trees. Each distribution is identified by an index and has its      own Merkle root. Users can claim their rewards by providing proofs of inclusion.      Security features:      - Double-hashed leaves to prevent second preimage attacks      - Bitmap-based claim tracking      - Safe ERC20 transfers      - Governance-controlled root addRoot(uint256,bytes32).details: Only callable by governanceReverts if root already exists for the given index

params.root: Merkle root hash of the distribution

canClaim(uint256,uint256,bytes32[]).details: Returns false if already claimed or proof is invalid

returns._0: bool True if claim is possible, false otherwise

claim(uint256,uint256,bytes32[]).details: Verifies proof, marks claim as processed, and transfers tokens

claimMultiple(uint256[],uint256[],bytes3.details: Processes multiple claims in a single transactionAll arrays must be equal length and non-empty

params.amounts: Array of amounts to claim from each distribution
params.indices: Array of distribution indices to claim from
params.proofs: Array of Merkle proofs for each claim

emergencyWithdraw(address,address,uint25.details: Only callable by governanceUsed for recovering stuck tokens or handling emergencies

params.roleTargetContract: The address of the contract the role is for

returns._0: bool True if the account has the Admirals Quarters role
bool True if already claimed, false otherwise

removeRoot(uint256).details: Only callable by governanceUsed for correcting errors or updating distributions

ADMIRALS_QUARTERS_ROLE().notice: Role identifier for admirals quarters bundler contract

GOVERNOR_ROLE().notice: Role identifier for protocol governors - highest privilege level with admin capabilities

SUPER_KEEPER_ROLE().notice: Role identifier for super keepers who can globally perform fleet maintanence roles

addRoot(uint256,bytes32).notice: Adds a new Merkle root for a distribution

canClaim(uint256,uint256,bytes32[]).notice: Checks if a user can claim from a distribution

claim(uint256,uint256,bytes32[]).notice: Claims rewards for a single distribution

claimMultiple(uint256[],uint256[],bytes3.notice: Claims rewards from multiple distributions at once

deployedAt().notice: Timestamp when the contract was deployed

generateRole(uint8,address).notice: Generates a role identifier for a specific contract and role

hasAdmiralsQuartersRole(address).notice: Checks if an account has the Admirals Quarters role

hasClaimed(address,uint256).notice: Checks if a user has already claimed from a distribution

roots(uint256).notice: Mapping of distribution indices to their Merkle roots
